member.name: IP_UNIDIRECTIONAL_ADAPTER_ADDRESS
member.summary: TheIP_UNIDIRECTIONAL_ADAPTER_ADDRESS structure stores the IPv4 addresses associated with a unidirectional adapter.

member.name: IP_UNIDIRECTIONAL_ADAPTER_ADDRESS.NumAdapters
member.summary: The number of IPv4 addresses pointed to by the Address member.

member.name: IP_UNIDIRECTIONAL_ADAPTER_ADDRESS.Address
member.summary: An array of variables of type . Each element of the array specifies an IPv4 address associated with this unidirectional adapter.
